response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure an exceptional item at a price that's slightly above its intrinsic value to you, ensuring a fair deal for both parties. I look forward to your consideration and the chance to contribute to your success.", "product_price": 9500}
